thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Lisa Velardi
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Lisa Velardi

author: Lisa Velardi
title: Lisa Velardi
text: Had a nice experience with Steve at Auto Lenders. The vehicle I found online was available, and Steve ensured I was comfortable without being overly pushy. He worked well with me on pricing and even offered some advice for how to sell my old vehicle. I had an issue with my car the day after purchase related to a software update, and Steve was able to help me get to the right people to get it fixed in a timely matter. I'd highly recommend Steve and the team at Auto Lenders to anyone looking for a high quality pre-owned vehicle.
